EVALUATION_FACTORS.Factor: Do they understand the agreed requirements of the brand?
Are there missing or 'creative interpretations' of strategic elements?
Insight Development - Do the creatives seek a full briefing before writing?
Are they idea-oriented? Do they write advertising to ideas they can identify and you can boards? Are they able to develop big, campaignable ideas?
Execution Development - Are the executions of the ideas they bring dramatic and unexpected? Or are they uninspired and plodding?
Responsiveness - Do the creatives listen and understand as well as they present and sell? Are copy meetings constructive and move the ball forward or are they defensive 'wars of attrition'?
Total Quality - Overall, are the Creative people applying Total Quality principles to get to advertising faster and better?
